group_1.narration: But wait...@Where did this record come from?
When even the twinkling stars slept, @the goddess discovered a singular, unknown @record she had forgotten was spinning.
She should have known it, but did not.@She did not recognize it, though she should.
She had never experienced anything@remotely similar since she came to be.@Filled with excitement and uncertainty,@she reached out for this disc,@and gently set her needle upon it.
From its grooves, she hears the@familiar songs of Magical Girls.
A song of a small heroine, weaving history.@A girl dreaming of galaxies in an alley.@One penning her feelings in a secret room.
Each song the goddess heard belonged to@a Magical Girl who had received her grace.
She nodded her head to their familiar songs,@wondering how she did not know this record,@with its music that she knew so well.
